name: CyberBlocks
description:
A 3D Puzzle game where you take control of a cube and try to navigate an invisible labyrinth. The only way to see where you are going is by using a charged power that will reveal everything in your line of sight for a few seconds.
Try your best to navigate the labyrinth while avoiding its many dangers all the while enjoying the synthwave aesthetic.

Controls

WASD - To move

Spacebar - Press and hold then release to launch an energy wave to reveal everything in your line of sight

E - Instant short range energy wave that reveals everything around you
